description: Change of use of the ground floor from office (Use Class B1(a)) to residential and conversion with the first floor to provide a single dwellinghouse, erection of a single storey rear extension (including excavation of land to the rear), installation of  new ground floor entrance, new and replacement windows and rooflights.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: OS Location Plan (No Ref), 1606/P/02, 1606/P/03, 1606/P/04C, 1606/P/05C, 1606/P/06, Design & Access Statement Rev A (Jan 2017), Photographic Report (Oct 2016), Arboricultural Appraisal (Tree Projects 15th Jan), Basement Impact Assessment (Fairhurst Jan 2017), Agent Letters dated 10th April 2017 and 17th July 2017, List of Offices to let in NW1, Building Condition Report (Collett-Zarzycki June 2017), Refurbishment Works Cost Estimate (June 2017), TSP Marketing Report (TSP July 2017), Bruce Commercial Email dated 5th July 2017.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Details of all external materials (including samples to be provided) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to the commencement of the development. The development shall be implemented only in accordance with the approved details, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.

Reason:  To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3, Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 no extensions or alterations, roof extensions or other alterations or outbuildings shall be carried out at the site without the grant of planning permission having first been obtained from the local planning authority.

Reason: To safeguard the visual amenities of the area and to prevent over development of the site by controlling proposed extensions and alterations in order to ensure compliance with the requirements of policies A1, D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - The basement works (excavation of land to the rear) hereby approved shall not commence until such time as a suitably qualified chartered engineer with membership of the appropriate professional body has been appointed to inspect, approve and monitor the critical elements of the construction works throughout their duration to ensure compliance with the design which has been checked and approved by a building control body. Details of the appointment and the appointee's responsibilities shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to the commencement of development. Any subsequent change or reappointment shall be confirmed forthwith for the duration of the construction works.

Reason:  To safeguard the appearance and structural stability of neighbouring buildings and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy A5 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 6 - Details of tree protection including an arboricultural method statement in line with BS5837:2012, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to the commencement of the development. The development shall be implemented only in accordance with the approved details, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.

Reason: To ensure that the Council may be satisfied that the development will not have an adverse effect on existing trees and in order to maintain the character and amenities of the area in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 7 - The roof of the rear extension hereby permitted (including the altered roof of the existing rear extension) shall not be used as a roof terrace/balcony without prior consent in writing from the Local Planning Authority.      
 
Reason: In order to prevent unreasonable overlooking of neighbouring premises in accordance with the requirements of policy A1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
ward: Camden Town with Primrose Hill (Pre May 2022)
